cover.text: Don't miss our map with plenty of useful cycling information, and explore the rest of the pages!

map.title: Information Map
map.text: Map with the location of bikelanes, parking, stores, bikesharing and a whole lot more.

rules.title: Traffic Rules
rules.text: Compilation of the most important traffic rules for cyclists.

routes.title: Routes
routes.text: Library with touristic and leisure related cycling routes, organized by levels of difficulty.

beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.text: Compilation of useful tips directed at beginner urban cyclists.

forum.title: Forum
forum.text: Common place for sharing ideas, opinions, questions and advice between the cycling community.

blog.sub-heading: Check out our blog posts about cycling and other relevant topics such as mobility, urban lifestyle and more.

newsletter.disclaimer: Your data will not be shared with other parties.
newsletter.error: Please insert a valid e-mail format

footer.col1: Cycling Fizz is a digital common place for portuguese cyclists that gathers different types of useful information. It has an informative map, traffic rules for cyclists, cycling routes and a whole lot more.

col2.part1: Do you want to talk to us?
col2.part2: Send us a message on our social networks or email us at

col3.part1: Want us to keep you updated?
col3.part2: Leave your e-mail underneath. We promise not to clutter your inbox!
